definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Chastity belt is popular in small scope in present western countries.
sentences.chinese: 目前在西方國家，貞操帶在小範圍內有所流行。

sentences.english: I could not stop by keep thinking of chastity belt.
sentences.chinese: 我無法停止思考的貞操帶保留。

sentences.english: Some leather chastity belts or shorts are ideal too for the club scene.
sentences.chinese: 一些皮革貞操帶或短褲，是理想的太多的俱樂部。

sentences.english: Metal sculptures of the female form recall the medieval chastity belt.
sentences.chinese: 女體的金屬雕塑令人想到中古時期的貞操帶。
